Details.Name: sc_main_benefit
Details.Feature: Enjoy up to 22.9% petrol savings at Caltex and up to 24% petrol savings at SPC. Up to 50% off with UOB dining privileges (eg: 1-1 Buffet at Singapore Marriott Tang Plaza Hotel, Orchard Hotel and Carlton Hotel)
Earn up to 3.33% p.a on savings in UOB One Account.
Receive up to 5% cashback on all spend (including overseas spend) for spend above $2000/month and up to 3.33% cashback for spend between S$500 - S$1,999/month.

Details.Name: sc_promotion_details
Details.Feature: S$50 Cash Credit for your first UOB card

Details.Name: sc_promotion_cond
Details.Feature: 1. Limited to first 600 applicants who had never held a UOB Principal Card in the last 6 months prior to 1 Jan 2016. 2. Charge a minimum amount of S$600 within the first 30 days of card approval. 3. Promotion is not valid for UOB PRVI Miles American Express® Card, UOB PRVI Miles World MasterCard Card and UOB PRVI Miles Visa Card application. 4. Promotion period from 1 January 2016 to 31 March 2016.

Details.Name: sc_gift_details
Details.Feature: S$50 Cash Credit for your first UOB Card

Details.Name: sc_other_fee
Details.Feature: Interest Free Period: Up to 21 days
Minimum Repayment: 3% of current balance or $50, whichever is higher, plus any overdue amounts.

Details.Name: sc_disclosure
Details.Feature: Earn up to 3.33% p.a. deposit interest rate on UOB One Account by: 1. Spending at least S$500 on UOB One Card AND 2. Crediting salary (min. S$2,000) via GIRO OR Performing 3 GIRO debits in each calendar month.
Receive up to 5% cash rebate with a min. spend of S$2,000/month for each qualifying quarter with at least 3 purchases. Receive up to 3.33% cash rebate if spend is between S$500 – S$1999/month.
